src:
Kristersson: Löfvens fel att islamister släppts
De sex radikala islamister som släppts, trots att Säpo klassar dem som säkerhetshot, borde sitta inspärrade, anser Moderaternas Ulf Kristersson. Statsministern är för långsam – och måste snabba på en lagändring, enligt M-ledaren. ”Det här är något i hästväg. Det vi ser i dag är ett haveri”, säger Ulf Kristersson.
02 Nov 2019, 18:41 by TT








Foto: Claudio Bresciani/TT
Foto: Fredrik Sandberg/TT

text:
"Nolan" Soaring Black, Hit Paris - "Nadal" Withdraw

02 Nov 2019, 18:22


"Novak Djokovic" marched through to compete for the black tennis "Paris Masters" successfully after rounding "Griggly Dimitrov" in two straight sets. "Rafael Nadal" unfortunately, injuries must be withdrawn. In the playoffs

ATP World Tour Masters Tennis Tournament 1000, "Paris Masters" in Paris, France Last saturday In the men's singles category Semifinals of Novak Djokovic, 1st hand of the world and of items from Serbia Recorded through the Black list in the Masters 1000 is the 50th position in the career after defeating Grigory Dimitrov from Bulgaria with 2 spectacular sets in a row 7-6 (7-5), 6-4 for The finals "Nolie" will pass to meet with Denis Chapawalov, a rising star from Canada. Who passed the final round in the Masters 1000 list for the first time in a career After competitors in the playoffs, Rafael Nadal Teng 2 from Spain, withdrew before the competition due to injury to the abdominal muscles. Image gettyimages
